attributes.action: Mandate a no phone policy in school. Hand in/ out at the start/end of each day.
attributes.additional_details:
Following the documentary, adolescence, and a number of complaints from both students and teachers, it is clear that mobile phones are effecting our children’s mental health, and ability to learn and concentrate in school. 
It creates so much pressure on teachers and leads to a toxic environment where teachers have to consistently tell the students to put their phones away.
attributes.background: To create a check in and check out facility for students to hand in their phones at the start of each day and to collect when leaving the school.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require schools to ban students use of smartphones during school hours
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/719230
